results.content: I have familiarity with Divi and just need a refresher course. Daryl talks pretty fast, though, and his videos cut off abruptly at the end. However, overall, it's a pleasant presentation and he clearly know what he's talking about.

results.content: Videos feel like they were put together in a hurry and without much thought.  Most if not all usually start and end with the audio and/or explanations being cut off abruptly.  Makes you feel like your missing what is taught and have to piece things together.  I'm also having a hard time getting past the constant usage of the filler word "here" being said over and over and over and over. Becomes an annoyance that deters me from wanting to proceeding any further... I did finish the full course, and found that there were some helpful websites and information provided near the end of Section 3.
